CAREER SUMMARY  
 
2017 to Date: Present Co mpany  
A global leading biotechnology  company  that covers a wide range inc luding IVD, Immunology  and Infect ious 
Diseases  
2018 to Date 
Position: Key Account M anager  
Key achievements:         
• Distribution of portfolio* to regional and international (key)accounts in the IVD and molecular diagnostic 
segment primarily  in UK, Italy, Germany,  and Israel; volume of annual sales ~13 Mio. €  
• Identification & development of  growth potentials and strategies for specific customer segments,  
• Secure the supply through alignment of external and internal forecasts, managing bot tleneck and out -of-
stock -situations  
• Develop and maintain strategic long -term trusting relationships with clients,  coordination of customised or 
contract manufacturing  and alignment of quality and supply agreement conclusion  
• Monitoring of crucial parameters like revenue, profit and price trends and take measures when needed fo r the 
area of responsibility  
• Matrix leadership for global key accounts coordination and consolidation activities with other regions (NAM & 
APAC)  
*Raw materials for clinical chemistry (enzymes, subst rates), immunology (antibodies, labelling) and m olecular 
diagnostics (polymerase, nucleotides etc.) and OEM -reagents  
 
2017  - 2018  
Position : Prod uct Manager   
Key achievements:         
• Local (Swiss market) commercialization of a blockbuster dr ug for breast c ancer (annual revenue ~50 Mio. €)  
 • Analysis and monitoring of market trends and competition, frequent execution of market research  
• Accurate and extensive forecasting and creation of forecasting models as  well as business planning  
• Responsible for the exec ution, planning and implementation of communication strategies and tactics in the 
framework of compliance  
• Success monitoring and optimisati on of (multichannel -)marketing campaigns, working closely with marketing 
agencies  
• Planning and control of the assig ned marketing budget   
 
2013 to 2017 : Previous Com pany  
Global Biotechnology  company with a leading position  in IVD  
2015 - 2017 
Position: Prod uct Manager   
Key achievements:         
• Product management & marketing responsibilities for a broad portfolio* in th e segments pharma and cosmetic 
industry (annual revenue ~12 Mio. €)  
• Planning and execution of product  launches  
• Product forecast, price policy, monitoring of profitability of the according portfolio  
• Market and competition analysis, alignment of diverse m arketing initiatives   
• Coordination of exhibition appearance and planning of internal and external eve nts   
• Support and training of sales team  
*Portfolio: culture media, clean room monitoring, microbial identification (mass spectroscopy & biochemical), 
rapid microbiology methods (solid and flow cytometry) including the related reagents and service contr acts  
 
2013 - 2015  
Position:  Sales Representative   
• Key Support and development of customer base in the pharma and cosmetic industries in South Germany, 
sales ~3 Mio. € per year  
• Pursuing and completion of mid and big size sales projects in the fields systems, reagents and service   
• Usage and maintenance of CRM -system and market data database  
• Acquisi tion of new customers and continuous screening of the market  (focus sterile pharma & biotech 
companies)  
• Portfolio as described above
